title: About Archaic
description: Who we are and what we're building.

body.raw: Archaic was founded on the vision of bridging the gap between the physical and digital worlds. Our original flagship, the Archaic Marketplace, empowers physical artists by turning their works into 3D-scanned digital twins that can be minted and sold as NFTs. We expanded into Escave, a gamified mobile AR experience with daily riddles, object detection, and collectible 3D scans. Building on the same 3D tech, Artifakt enables brands to offer real-time 3D product customization online. Together, these ventures form the Archaic Verse—a unified ecosystem where art, play, and commerce converge through immersive technology and blockchain-powered ownership.

title: The Archaic Verse
description: Our roadmap to a unified ecosystem.

body.raw:
## The Loop

**Artists → Marketplace → 3D Assets → Players (Escave) → Brands (Artifakt) → Shared ownership/utility → Back to artists.**

- **Artists** scan physical pieces into **3D assets** and mint digital twins on the **Archaic Marketplace**.
- **Players** encounter those assets through **Escave** gameplay (AR riddles, object detection, collectibles).
- **Brands** integrate the same assets via **Artifakt** for real-time 3D customization in e-commerce.
- **Ownership & utility** flows back to **artists**, creating a network effect that powers the **Archaic Verse**.

---

## Roadmap

**Now**

- Content pipeline for 3D scans
- Marketplace waitlist & creator onboarding
- Escave closed beta loops & Escave+ perks

**Next**

- Marketplace mint/sell/trade for digital twins
- Escave seasonal events & trophy system
- Artifakt pilots with select e-commerce partners

**Future**

- Interconnected asset utility across all ventures
- Cross-venture identity, progression, and rewards
- Full Archaic Verse ecosystem live

body.raw:
**Artifakt** is a 3D customization engine for online stores, letting buyers view and configure products in real-time before purchase—improving confidence and conversion.

**Benefits for brands**

- True-to-life 3D previews and options
- Lower return rates, higher AOV
- Easy integration into modern storefronts

_Use “Request a demo” to talk with our team._

body.raw:
**Escave** is a mobile IOS AR scavenger-hunt and riddle game. Solve daily clues, use object detection to discover in-world artifacts, and collect 3D scans you can show off as trophies.

### Escave+ perks

- ad-free Hints
- 1 of each power-up monthly
- 2 escave tokens used for downloading the 3D assets

_Tap “Download Now” Available on the App Store_

title: Archaic Marketplace
description: 3D-scanned digital twins for artists, powered by NFTs.

body.raw:
**Coming soon.** The Archaic Marketplace is a platform for physical artists to scan works in 3D, mint NFT digital twins, and sell or trade them. It’s the bridge between traditional art and Web3, built to protect provenance and expand reach.

- Scan physical art in 3D
- Mint as NFT digital twin
- Sell/trade with collectors and fans

_Join the waitlist using the form on this page._
